snippet: The co-founder of PayPal will write about forming companies of the future, and building “great things that have never existed before.’'
abstract: PayPal co-founder Peter A Thiel is writing book Zero to One, which will be published by Crown Business.
lead_paragraph: The co-founder of PayPal will write about forming companies of the future, and building “great things that have never existed before.’'

headline.main: Peter Thiel to Write Book on Building Companies
headline.print_headline: PayPal Co-Founder Is Writing a Book
